title: Preparation of Reagents for FAST slides
author: Opentrons
description: This protocol allows your robot to transfer reagents from reagent reservoir and microcentrifuge tubes to a 96-well plate.
process:
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will transfer 195 uL buffer A from reservoir well A1 to 96-well plate rows A-E of columns 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8, 10, and 11.
Robot will transfer 5 uL sample from microcentrifuge tubes to the wells that contain buffer A.
Robot will transfer buffer B to from reservoir well A2 to 96-well plate rows A-G of columns 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8, 10, and 11.
notes:
300 uL Tip Rack setup:
1. Remove the last 3 tips of column 1 (leaving tips for row A-E)
2. Remove the last tip of column 2 (leaving tips for row A-G)

This protocol requires our 4-in-1 Tube Rack Set
If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

markdown.title: Preparation of Reagents for FAST slides
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This protocol allows your robot to transfer reagents from reagent reservoir and microcentrifuge tubes to a 96-well plate.
markdown.process:
1. Download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
5. Hit "Run".
6. Robot will transfer 195 uL buffer A from reservoir well A1 to 96-well plate rows A-E of columns 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8, 10, and 11.
7. Robot will transfer 5 uL sample from microcentrifuge tubes to the wells that contain buffer A.
8. Robot will transfer buffer B to from reservoir well A2 to 96-well plate rows A-G of columns 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8, 10, and 11.
markdown.notes:
300 uL Tip Rack setup:
1. Remove the last 3 tips of column 1 (leaving tips for row A-E)
2. Remove the last tip of column 2 (leaving tips for row A-G)

---

This protocol requires our [4-in-1 Tube Rack Set](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/opentrons-tips/products/tube-rack-set-1)


If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.
